alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Camp; Cass; Franklin; Marion; Morris; Red River; Titus; Upshur; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:46PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Marion, western Cass, Franklin, northern Wood, southwestern Bowie, northern Upshur, Morris, Titus, Camp and southern Red River Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 545 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mount Vernon, or 9 miles south of Hagansport, moving southeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant, New Boston, Pittsburg, Winnsboro, Hagansport, Leesburg, Boxelder, Mount Vernon, Daingerfield, Linden, Quitman, Hughes Springs, Lone Star, Naples, Bogata, Ore City, Maud, Omaha, Cason and Us 259 And I 30 Intersection. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Bowie; Camp; Cass; Franklin; Marion; Morris; Red River; Titus; Upshur; Wood
